MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L31 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Oakhill Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  2.16PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to repair a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, with a generator, by 9.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.10PM on 9th March 2021.
